sourcesContent:
import { alertToast } from '../../../service/toast_service' import '../css/Classroom.css' function ClassroomItem(props) { const classroom = props.classroom const accessClassroom = () => { if(classroom.status === "offline") { alertToast("老師尚未上線") return } } return (
name: {classroom.teacherNickname}
profession: {classroom.teacherProfession[0]}
status: {classroom.status}
description: {classroom.classDesc}
time: {classroom.classTime}
) } export default ClassroomItem
